Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class EchoService

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.EchoService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class EchoService
extends java.lang.Thread
    Main class used for communication between client and server. Through this class data is exchanged.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • EchoService

        public EchoService​(java.net.Socket acceptedSocket)
        EchoService constructor which pair Client with the EchoService allowing to easier communication with the use of created commands.
        Parameters:
        acceptedSocket - Client socket

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Overridden Thread run method which allows Server and Client to communicate with the use of created commands.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • firstPhase

        public void firstPhase​(java.lang.String input,
                       java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used for handling first phase of the Game in which every player gets the cards by 'deal cards' or 'get cards' method. If other command is sent otherCommands() method is called.
        Parameters:
        input - String containing Client's sent command
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result

      • secondFourthPhase

        public void secondFourthPhase​(java.lang.String input,
                              java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used for handling second and fourth phases of the Game in which every player place bets by calling 'bet XX' command, where XX is bet value. If other command is sent otherCommands() method is called.
        Parameters:
        input - String containing Client's sent command
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result

      • placeBet

        public void placeBet​(java.lang.String input,
                     int gamePhase,
                     java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used placing Bets during the second and fourth game phase. In here bet values are extracted from the command String and set to the suitable player.
        Parameters:
        input - String containing Client's sent command
        gamePhase - current game phase
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result

      • thirdPhase

        public void thirdPhase​(java.lang.String input,
                       java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used for handling third phase of the game in which players exchange their cards.
        Parameters:
        input - String containing Client's sent command
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result

      • fifthPhase

        public void fifthPhase​(java.lang.String input,
                       java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used for handling fifth phase of the game in which the winner is determined. Players are also able to call 'restart' command. If all of them call it the new game will start.
        Parameters:
        input - String containing Client's sent command
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result

      • otherCommands

        public void otherCommands​(java.lang.String input,
                          java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used for handling general commands which are not strongly associated with the specific game phase. Sample commands: - 'show cards' - show owned cards - 'players' - show players list - 'queue' - show queue order - 'bid status' - show current bid the highest value - 'phase' - show phase with short description - 'winner' - show the winner etc.
        Parameters:
        input - String containing Client's sent command
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result

      • printWonCards

        public static void printWonCards​(java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method for printing Winner Cards
        Parameters:
        out - PrintWriter used to print information

      • getMaxBet

        public int getMaxBet()
        Method used for finding maximum value of the current game phase bet. Used in the second or fourth game phase (bet phases).
        Returns:
        max value of bet

      • strGetQueue

        public java.lang.String strGetQueue()
        Method returning text representation of the queue.
        Returns:
        String representation of the queue

      • strGetHandValue

        public java.lang.String strGetHandValue()
        Method returning text representation of the Hand evaluation points.
        Returns:
        String with player's game points

      • getActualBetValue

        public int getActualBetValue()
        Method used to find the actual Client bet value. Used in the second or fourth game phase (bet phases).
        Returns:
        actual Client bet value

      • evaluateMyHand

        public void evaluateMyHand()

      • cardsExchange

        public boolean cardsExchange​(java.lang.String input,
                             java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used to exchange Player's (corresponding to Client) cards. Used in the third game phase (exchange phase).
        Parameters:
        input - String containing Client's sent command
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result
        Returns:
        true if success else false

      • dealCards

        public boolean dealCards​(java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Method used in the first GamePhase for dealing cards at the beginning of the game.
        Parameters:
        out - PrintWriter which will print the result
        Returns:
        true if success else false

      • strServerLog

        public java.lang.String strServerLog​(java.lang.String nickname,
                                     java.lang.String input)
        Method used for logging players' command calls.
        Parameters:
        nickname - Nick of the calling Player
        input - String with the command
        Returns:
        Log with the information about called command, player nickname and phase in which command was called.

      • exitServer

        public void exitServer​(java.lang.String nickname)
        Method lets Client exit the Server.
        Parameters:
        nickname - Nick of the exiting Player.

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame()
        Method which restarts the game. Is called when all players votes for the restart in the fifth game phase.
